root: ^Ugh... what time is it? I feel awful.
^Well, if you want an answer to your question, it's 3 in the afternoon.
^You're one for questions today, aren't you?
^As long as you're here to answer them.
^In that case, I came in this morning and you weren't there.
^I knew you were tired last night, but it's unusual for you to just... not show up.
^So I came over here to see how you were.
^What happened last night to put you in this state?
^To be perfectly honest, Ariar. Something weird happened.
^Well, as you know, I was attacked out of nowhere.
^And I hate to admit it, but I was losing the battle.
^So I tried to attack with magic, but it was wrong. My magic was weaker than normal, and it drained my energy.
^I could hardly muster the call to you, and when I did I could hardly keep fighting.
^I don't know what happened, but I didn't like it.
^Last night there was a sudden surge in reports of lost magic.
^It seems to be affecting all magic-users.
^Symptoms are, well, I don't really need to explain the symptoms to you, since you just went through it.
^Yeah, the worlds been in a bit of a panic.
^The House leaders are having a council today to discuss the matter and how to handle it.
^That must mean it's serious. I have to go.
^I knew you would, but unfortunately only House members are invited to sit in.
^And unfortunately, because I work with you, I haven't been invited.
^I have to get in. I need to know what's going on.
^Unless you want to go, of course. One of us should stay behind again.
^If the Houses really are in distress, it's best for us to be safe.
^We must be cautious from now on, but I think this mission would be better for you.
^I figured you would want to go, so I have a plan to sneak you in.
^Which reminds me, do you mind the smell of sewage?
^Not as much as I mind losing my magic.
^I'm glad to hear it. I have checked the sewer passages.
^If you're sure about this, then here's a map, and some gloves.
^You'd probably better hurry. I don't know how long it will take you to navigate.
^Did you suggest I should go just so you don't have to climb through the sewage.
^Right. Well, I am more than willing to go myself, although I must admit I'd prefer not to.
^I dread the thought of getting caught by my House leader while covered in sewage.
^For you it would be much easier to escape the situation without being reprimanded.
^If that is the case, I will go. I'd like to see the council directly.
^Make sure to take the gloves. I think they will prove useful.
^Of course, Ariar. I will be leaving presently.
^Good. I'll be off to get some air fresheners and cleaning supplies.
^You're not getting in there clean, and the office is not going to suffer for it.
^Ah. Ew. I don't even want to know what this stuff is.
^Ugh, that smell. I have to be close by now.
^More importantly, I gotta get out of this stuff.
^Wait, I hear a noise. That sounds like the council.
^Looks like Ariar's information was on point.
^I hope they get some extra strength cleaning supplies, or else I'll never salvage this outfit.
^House Cherry Blossom's members are the last to enter, but instead of the leader, the lieutenant of the house enters instead.
^I would like to extend my leader's apologies to you.
^Unfortunately they are indisposed at the moment, and I have come in their stead.
^Not to worry, we are glad that you, at least, are here.
^Indeed. And now that you are, shall we commence?
^First Ariar wasn't on board with coming to this, now one of the leaders has something else going on?
^Am I the only person who wants to be here?
^Before we commence, we must first take roll for the records.
^Rest assured we would not miss such an important council.

root.#: name Sir Richter Kel Veridian X

root: ^And as we know, one leader from House Cherry Blossom is present.
^Yes. I extend my apologies once more.
^And of course, both of us from Belladonna are here.
^Indeed we are. Now we may commence with the council.
^I speak on behalf of House Ivy that we are truly concerned, not just for ourselves, but for the whole of the world.
^We hope you have all managed without any severe accidents or injuries.
^We all know what we're gathering for, might as well lay it all out on the table.
^Magic is destabilizing, and one of our own nearly lost their life when their magic failed them.
^We need to find who is responsible and why!
^I certainly agree with both of you.
^House Holly is extremely distressed about the magic destabilizing, and we will take all possible action to aid in correcting the issue and punishing those who have caused it.
^But we must also ensure that everyone is safe.
^Yes, Patience is key to all our actions.
^Those are fine points, but what is there to bring to the table?
^You may have not brought up your own troubles, but it is simple enough to read upon your faces that you are having similar experiences with the magic.
^Has anyone found the source of this?
^It makes sense that House Spider-Lily would be angry.
^Demons are often most vulnerable to destabilized magic.
^You are correct in your presumptions of our current situation, but I'm afraid that we know little.
^This mystical malady strikes without warning, and we have found no correlation between it's victims.
^Be they young or old, talented or inept, members of our house are being stripped of their magic.

root.#: name Sir Richter Kel Veridian X

root: ^Yes, this certainly seems to affect all individuals in a similar way.

root.#: name Sir Richter Kel Veridian X

root: ^We have put together an emergency task force to address the issue and protect all citizens from this... despicable curse.
^Have you considered that other houses may benefit from a similar task force.
^I commend you all on addressing the safety of your houses, but we must take action to find who is responsible.
^The only reason you find yourself financially weakened is because you spend your wealth on pointless regalities.
^Let us stop bickering and pointing fingers.
^Punishing the perpetrator will do little for us if we cannot treat those afflicted.
^Our world cannot last without magic, we must find a way to maintain it.
^We cannot allow ourselves and our fellows to be rendered incapable of weaving magic.
^However, so far, we have not found a way to reverse the effects, only to slow them.
^Unfortunately we have found that the more one practices their arcane abilities,
^the faster their ability to call upon magic is drained. What was once a constant supply has now become finite.
^You yourself may be already affected, but your magic has yet to be drained to noticeable levels.
^Then perhaps we should enact a limit on practicing magic as quickly as possible.
^If we are to preserve our talents, we take preventative action.
^If this is what is best for all the houses as a whole, then House Holly is in full support of this magic limit.
^We want what is best to protect our citizens.
^Of course you would say this, Sevelia.
^Not one member of our house would so willingly limit their magic.

root.#: name Sir Richter Kel Veridian X

root: ^You dare to deny our free magic use?

root.#: name Sir Richter Kel Veridian X

root: ^Free use of Magic is a fundamental right that was agreed upon indefinitely by our ancestors.

root.#: name Sir Richter Kel Veridian X

root: ^Are you suggesting we turn from tradition and ignored those before us.

root.#: name Sir Richter Kel Veridian X

root: ^Many leaders of House Ivy before me fought for the maintenance of this right, some have even died for it.

root.#: name Sir Richter Kel Veridian X

root: ^If you even for a second, consider that I would not do the same, than you are nothing but a pitiful fool.

root.#: name Sir Richter Kel Veridian X

root: ^House Ivy does not tolerate even the consideration of a magic limit. You are all blind.
^It serves no benefit to grow angry.

root.#: name Sir Richter Kel Veridian X
name Sir Richter Kel Veridian X
name Sir Richter Kel Veridian X

root: ^You are all an embarrassment to the world.

root.#: name Sir Richter Kel Veridian X

root: ^Especially you, Belladonna, to propose such a thing so calmly.

root.#: name Sir Richter Kel Veridian X

root: ^And Holly, your audacity to be complicit in such a heinous crime. I have had enough!

root.#: name Sir Richter Kel Veridian X

root: ^I need to get out of here, but there could be someone in trouble down there.
^Someone here has only grown stronger in their magic.
^I have to get out of here before my cover is blown!
